distinct
from O_REMOVE_ACCOUNT
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into O_REMOVE_ACCOUNT (ID, RMONTH, AG_ID, AG_NAME, BUS_NUM, BUS_PLATFORM, MACHINES_AMOUNT, SUBMIT_PERSON, SUBMIT_TIME, PAY_METHOD, RAMOUNT, REAL_RAMOUNT, RSTATUS, FINISH_TIME, BATCH_NUM, RTYPE, FAIL_CAUSE, REMARK, STATUS, VERSION, LOGICAL_VERSION ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rmonth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{agId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busPlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{machinesAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{submitPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{submitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ramount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{realRamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{batchNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rtype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{failCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{logicalVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update O_REMOVE_ACCOUNT
RMONTH = #{rmonth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AG_ID = #{agId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AG_NAME = #{agName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUS_NUM = #{busNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUS_PLATFORM = #{busPlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MACHINES_AMOUNT = #{machinesAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SUBMIT_PERSON = #{submitPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBMIT_TIME = #{submitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PAY_METHOD = #{payMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RAMOUNT = #{ramount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REAL_RAMOUNT = #{realRamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RSTATUS = #{rstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FINISH_TIME = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BATCH_NUM = #{batchNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RTYPE = #{rtype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FAIL_CAUSE = #{failCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VERSION = VERSION + 1,
LOGICAL_VERSION = #{logicalVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update O_REMOVE_ACCOUNT set RMONTH = #{rmonth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AG_ID = #{agId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AG_NAME = #{agName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUS_NUM = #{busNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUS_PLATFORM = #{busPlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MACHINES_AMOUNT = #{machinesAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUBMIT_PERSON = #{submitPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBMIT_TIME = #{submitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PAY_METHOD = #{payMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RAMOUNT = #{ramount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REAL_RAMOUNT = #{realRamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RSTATUS = #{rstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FINISH_TIME = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BATCH_NUM = #{batchNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RTYPE = #{rtype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FAIL_CAUSE = #{failCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VERSION = VERSION + 1, LOGICAL_VERSION = #{logicalVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

sql.if: select * from ( select row_.*, rownum rownum_ from (

if.test: begin != null and end != null and end >0

sql.if: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM (

if.test: begin != null and end != null and end >0

mapper.select: select * from ( select ra.id,ra.BATCH_NUM,to_char(ra.RMONTH,'yyyy-mm') as omonth,ra.SUBMIT_TIME, ag.AG_UNIQ_NUM,ra.ag_name,ra.bus_num,plat.PLATFORM_NAME,a.* , ra.ramount,ra.pay_method,ra.submit_person,ra.rstatus,ra.remark, ra.FINISH_TIME ,at.att_name,at.ATT_DBPATH,at.id as asId from O_REMOVE_ACCOUNT ra left join ( select o_payment_detail.src_id,o_payment_detail.src_type from O_PAYMENT_DETAIL ) a on ra.id=a.src_id left join a_agent ag on ag.id=ra.ag_id left join a_platform plat ON plat.platform_num = ra.bus_platform left join a_attachment_rel rel on rel.SRC_ID=ra.BATCH_NUM left join a_attachment at ON at.id = rel.att_id WHERE ra.status = 1 union select ra.id,ra.BATCH_NUM,to_char(ra.RMONTH,'yyyy-mm') as omonth,ra.SUBMIT_TIME, ag.AG_UNIQ_NUM,ra.ag_name,ra.bus_num,plat.PLATFORM_NAME,a.* , ra.ramount,ra.pay_method,ra.submit_person,ra.rstatus,ra.remark, ra.FINISH_TIME ,at.att_name,at.ATT_DBPATH,at.id as asId from O_REMOVE_ACCOUNT ra left join ( select o_payment_detail.src_id,o_payment_detail.src_type from O_PAYMENT_DETAIL ) a on ra.id=a.src_id left join a_agent ag on ag.id=ra.ag_id left join a_platform plat ON plat.platform_num = ra.bus_platform left join a_attachment_rel rel on rel.SRC_ID=ra.BATCH_NUM left join a_attachment at ON at.id = rel.att_id WHERE ra.status = 1 )aa order by aa.SUBMIT_TIME desc

select count(1) from ( select ra.id,ra.BATCH_NUM,to_char(ra.RMONTH,'yyyy-mm') as omonth,ra.SUBMIT_TIME, ag.AG_UNIQ_NUM,ra.ag_name,ra.bus_num,plat.PLATFORM_NAME,a.* , ra.ramount,ra.pay_method,ra.submit_person,ra.rstatus,ra.remark, ra.FINISH_TIME ,at.att_name from O_REMOVE_ACCOUNT ra left join ( select o_payment_detail.src_id,o_payment_detail.src_type from O_PAYMENT_DETAIL ) a on ra.id=a.src_id left join a_agent ag on ag.id=ra.ag_id left join a_platform plat ON plat.platform_num = ra.bus_platform left join a_attachment_rel rel on rel.SRC_ID=ra.BATCH_NUM left join a_attachment at ON at.id = rel.att_id WHERE ra.status = 1 union select ra.id,ra.BATCH_NUM,to_char(ra.RMONTH,'yyyy-mm') as omonth,ra.SUBMIT_TIME, ag.AG_UNIQ_NUM,ra.ag_name,ra.bus_num,plat.PLATFORM_NAME,a.* , ra.ramount,ra.pay_method,ra.submit_person,ra.rstatus,ra.remark, ra.FINISH_TIME ,at.att_name from O_REMOVE_ACCOUNT ra left join ( select o_payment_detail.src_id,o_payment_detail.src_type from O_PAYMENT_DETAIL ) a on ra.id=a.src_id left join a_agent ag on ag.id=ra.ag_id left join a_platform plat ON plat.platform_num = ra.bus_platform left join a_attachment_rel rel on rel.SRC_ID=ra.BATCH_NUM left join a_attachment at ON at.id = rel.att_id WHERE ra.status = 1 )aa order by aa.SUBMIT_TIME desc
select a.id from O_REMOVE_ACCOUNT a where a.status=1 and a.RSTATUS = #{rStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select op.DOWN_PAYMENT_COUNT,o.C_TIME ,ag.AG_UNIQ_NUM,plat.platform_name, to_char(o_payment_detail.plan_pay_time,'yyyy-mm') rmonth, o_payment_detail.Payment_status ,o_payment_detail.plan_num , o_payment_detail.pay_amount ,o_payment_detail.order_id ,o_payment_detail.src_id, ra.AG_NAME ,ra.id,ra.AG_ID, ra.BUS_PLATFORM,ra.BUS_NUM, ra.RAMOUNT,ra.REAL_RAMOUNT, ra.PAY_METHOD from O_PAYMENT_DETAIL left join O_REMOVE_ACCOUNT ra on ra.id=o_payment_detail.src_id left join O_PAYMENT op on O_PAYMENT_DETAIL.PAYMENT_ID=op.id left join a_agent ag on ag.id=ra.ag_id left join a_platform plat ON plat.platform_num = ra.bus_platform left join o_order o on o.id=o_payment_detail.order_id where o_payment_detail.Payment_status in(2,4,6)

select count(1) from O_PAYMENT_DETAIL left join O_REMOVE_ACCOUNT ra on ra.id=o_payment_detail.src_id left join O_PAYMENT op on O_PAYMENT_DETAIL.PAYMENT_ID=op.id left join a_agent ag on ag.id=ra.ag_id left join a_platform plat ON plat.platform_num = ra.bus_platform left join o_order o on o.id=o_payment_detail.order_id where o_payment_detail.Payment_status in(2,4,6)
